channel.title: How do i make item tradeble
channel.description: I want to make an item non-tradeble to tradeble so i can trade this item

item.title: How do i make item tradeble
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“s3v3r3ds0ul, post:2, topic:344305”]search the item code and you should see something like this

if(item == ****); sM("You cannot trade this item."); return; }

something like that. and if you want to trade it just delete that section of code.[/quote]
Not really…

Go into your client.java and search for noTrade all the iD’s under that you can’t trade, just remove the ID from the list you want tradeable

Read full topic
